PSCT.Base: Place 1 "Vaylantz" Pendulum Monster from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone. If a card is in a Field Zone: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Vaylantz" monster in your Main Monster Zone; move that monster you control to an adjacent (horizontal) Monster Zone. You can only use each effect of "Vaylantz Wakening - Solo Activation" once per turn.
